## Description {#details}

Diagnostic information for debug metadata version reporting.

This is basically a module and a version.

Definition at line 208 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
